body_html: We are aware of the fact that there are cases where we shard the processing of the Eigen tensors too much, and plan to address this in the future. In the meantime, I'd be very happy to replace the current implementation of the ThreadPool class with a lock free implementation if you can contribute one. It would help speed things up quite a bit.
body_text: We are aware of the fact that there are cases where we shard the processing of the Eigen tensors too much, and plan to address this in the future. In the meantime, I'd be very happy to replace the current implementation of the ThreadPool class with a lock free implementation if you can contribute one. It would help speed things up quite a bit.
body: We are aware of the fact that there are cases where we shard the processing of the Eigen tensors too much, and plan to address this in the future. In the meantime, I'd be very happy to replace the current implementation of the ThreadPool class with a lock free implementation if you can contribute one. It would help speed things up quite a bit.
